constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 93 (Friday, May 27, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of Washington:
H.R. 7900.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority on which this bill rests is
the power of Congress ``to provide for the common Defence'',
``to raise and support Armies'', ``to provide and maintain a
Navy'' and ``to make Rules for the Government and Regulation
of the land and naval Forces'' as enumerated in Article I,
section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H5221]

latestAction.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR S6063-6466)
